main.java.latexee.utils

Class OutputWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.latexee.utils.OutputWriter

  • public class OutputWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class OutputWriter contains methods to manipulate and write strings to files. Methods here are used for either program output or for testing.

      • formulasToTXT

        @Deprecated
public static void formulasToTXT(ParsedStatement tree,
                                              java.lang.String filename)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is no longer required and is deprecated. This was used to write formulas in string (2+3) to output file
        Parameters:
        tree - document tree node
        filename - output file name

      • gatherFormulas

        public static void gatherFormulas(ParsedStatement tree,
                                  java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
        Gathers formulas from document parse tree and adds them to string.
        Parameters:
        tree - document tree node
        sb - StringBuilder object that is built from finding formulas from the file

      • prettyParseTree

        public static java.lang.String prettyParseTree(org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree tree)
        This method is only used for testing purposes. Prettifies a parse tree in string format
        Parameters:
        tree - parse tree to be output in beautified manner
        Returns:
        beautified string of parse tree

        Returns:
